description.value:
This glass bottle embellished with brass decorations appears to be a lesser energy breath potion of a specific type, but has been polluted, making it toxic to use.

Activate 1 (manipulate)

Effect You drink from the bottle and must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:25] saving throw or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure) and immediately vomit the potion directly onto yourself, taking @Damage[5d6[untyped]] damage of the same damage type the potion deals and expending the item. If you succeed at your Fortitude save, you become sickened 1 but otherwise are able to unleash Energy Breath as normal for a lesser energy breath potion of the appropriate type.
